title: Sublet for August and September
posting_body: I am looking for someone to sublet my studio in Evanston, on Chicago Av and Greenleaf.
It is a great location close to downtown Evanston, the NU campus, the lake, and a walk to the grocery store and other businesses.
I am planning on moving out in the last week of July.
The lease could be extended if you are interested.
Gas and electricity are not included in the rent.
Message me if you have questions and if you're interested.
